tool_description: Options and time series data for traders. Fast and reliable.
name: FastFinanceAPI
title: FastFinanceAPI

api_list.name: getOptionChains
api_list.description: Retrieves an option chain given the ticker and the date retrieved using the endpoint getOptionsDates. The dates must be in the format YYYY-MM-DD (example: 2023-08-25). Use getOptionsDates to retrieve the correct dates for a given ticker.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com/getOptionChain/AAPL/2023-08-25"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com/getOptionChain/{ticker}/{date}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getOptionsDates
api_list.description: Retrieve an option chain for a given ticker.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com/getOptionsEndpoint/TSLA"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com/getOptionsEndpoint/{ticker}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com"

api_list.name: getHistoricalStockPrices
api_list.description: Time series data for a given stock and given period of time.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com/getStockHistory/AAPL/1mo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com/getStockHistory/{ticker}/{period}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getFinancialStatements
api_list.description: Get Financial Statements for a stock. Choose between different frequencies and types of statements.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com/get_financial_statements/TSLA/annual/income"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com/get_financial_statements/{ticker}/{frequency}/{statement_type}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fastfinanceapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
